text: Ignatius Zakka I Iwas (, , , born Sanharib Iwas; 21 April 1933 - 21 March 2014) was an Iraqi Christian religious leader. He was the 122nd Syriac Orthodox Patriarch of Antioch and All the East from 1980 until his death. He was also Supreme Head of the Universal Syriac Orthodox Church. He was born in Mosul, Iraq. Iwas died after a long illness on 21 March 2014 at a hospital in Kiel, Germany. He was 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ignatius Zakka I Iwas at the Syrian Church of Antioch & All the East Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Oriental Orthodox Christians Category:Patriarchs Category:Iraqi Christian clergy
title: Ignatius Zakka I Iwas
